Summary: Results-driven Backend Developer with expertise in .NET Core and C#. Experienced in building scalable RESTful APIs, automating workflows, and optimizing backend systems for performance. Skilled in SQL Server, asynchronous programming, and integrating third-party APIs. Adept at designing scheduler services, internal tools, and automation pipelines. Focused on clean architecture, robust backend design, and delivering production-ready solutions.

Responsibilities: Develop and maintain scalable, production-grade backend systems for flight operations.
Integrate multiple third-party airline APIs for live booking and fare services.
Build internal tools and services to automate repetitive or manual operations.
Implement secure API flows with JWT-based authorization.
Optimize database and cache usage for performance improvements.
Design and deploy scheduler services for monitoring and reporting.

Projects.Description: Built and maintained flight booking services integrating with third-party airline APIs including Travelport, Sabre, Indigo, Akasa, Air India Express, Flycreative, Vicky, Lords Travels, Travelopedia, PKfare, and various NDCs. Implemented async patterns to make APIs responsive and optimized caching logic, reducing memory usage by 40%.
Projects.Role: Backend developer responsible for core API logic, external integration, performance tuning, and production stability.

Projects.Description: Created a background scheduler service using .NET Core with `Timer` to automate tasks like updating booking purchases, currency rates, airline sectors, detecting fraud bookings and emailing responsible teams, generating daily booking reports, and monitoring API health with hourly WhatsApp alerts.
Projects.Role: Solo developer responsible for end-to-end logic, scheduling, delivery, and deployment of automated services.

Projects.Description:
Built a suite of CLI-based console applications to improve backend productivity and automation. Tools include:
• JSON Request Builder for C# APIs
• Daily Task Tracker
• Git Auto Pusher for daily commits
• New Sector Merger tool for integrating airline data.
Projects.Role: Designed and developed all tools independently to support backend operations and improve developer experience.
